page.title: 12PEOPLES' HOPES FOR THE AREA
page.content: RESIDENTS OF THIS AREA HOPE TO PRESERVE THE RURAL SETTING OF OPEN FIELD, LITTLE COPSES AND ROLLING HILLS, WHICH IS NATURAL AND UNSPOILT IN ITS GREAT BEAUTY. IT IS ALSO A SHELTER AND HOME FOR ABUNDANT WILDLIFE. THE LOCAL VILLAGES WITH GREAT CHARACTER AND CHARM, AND NEIGHBOURING HISTORIC HOUSES SHOULD ALL BE PROTECTED. FARMERS TOO, HOPE TO BE ABLE TO CONTINUE TO FOLLOW THEIR AGRICULTURAL PURSUITS WITHOUT INTERFERENCE. WHILST THE RESIDENTS HOPE TO BE ABLE TO CONTINUE THE TRADITIONAL WAYS OF VILLAGE AND COUNTRY LIFE, THEY DO NOT WISH TO BE EXCLUDED FROM PROGRESS IN SOME FORMS AND BECOME AN ANACHRONISM. THEY HOPE THERE CAN BE A BALANCE BETWEEN MODERN CONVENIENCE, HISTORY, TRADITION AND NATURAL BEAUTY.
